duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for the tactical delivery of features within assigned domain teams.
Lead one or more domain teams using Node, Lambdas, Microservices, React/React Native, etc.
Participate in meetings to review product requirements, clarify expected outcomes, and provide estimates for completion.
Identify and implement ideas to improve developer efficiency and velocity.
Work with team leads to document technical debt and roadmap requirements.
Facilitate and assign work to conduct root cause analysis of system issues and implement corrective solutions.
Create and perform continuous analysis of team performance and propose areas of improvement.
Work to align on technology being used on teams, determine standards, and refine processes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or relevant field (Master’s preferred)
